texts.text: Pocket Edition v0.7.3 alpha
v0.7.3 alpha was a minor update to Minecraft: Pocket Edition that was released on August 15, 2013.[1] This version changes the daylight cycle and fixed some of the bugs and crashes in v0.7.2.
iOS 4.3 is no longer supported in this version; v0.7.3 requires iOS 5.0 or later. Users running iOS 4.3 will only be able to play older versions of Pocket Edition.[2]
Contents

1 Additions
1.1 Gameplay
1.2 Blocks and items
2 Changes
2.1 General
2.2 Mobs
3 Fixes
4 References
Additions
Gameplay

Sun, moon, stars, sunrise and sunset.
Improved title screen
Splashes
Animated background
The menu panorama uses seed 2151901553968352745 in Java Edition Beta 1.7.3 at coordinates (61, 75, -68).[3]
Pocket realms improvements:
Realms can be reset
Blocks and items

Double chests
When chests are put together, items previously in the left chest appear at the bottom half. Items from the right chest will also appear at the top. This may cause a loss of items.
Chests now have an open/close animation.
The player can open chests in creative, but not look inside; they will immediately close.
Quartz slabs
Changes
General

Added more friction when flying in Creative Mode (iOS).
Stopped building the game with typeinfo enabled (iOS).
Wooden slab material changed to wood instead of stone. Wooden Slabs stored from before 0.7.3 are tagged as Fake Wood Slab and drop regular wooden slabs when mined.
When creating a new world, the default name shows "My World".
Mobs
Mobs now light on fire under sunlight.
Fixes

21 issues fixed
From released versions before 0.7.0

MCPE-39 – Wooden slab hard to break with axe
MCPE-271 – Too long descriptions
MCPE-312 – Sword freezes chest
MCPE-439 – Chests rotate when placing a solid block directly in front of them
MCPE-1664 – Hitting backspace in a sign activates shift on your keyboard.
MCPE-3989 – Inventory bug when throwing items in hand while in a GUI
MCPE-4122 – Glowing obsidian can yield resources with an iron pickaxe, but obsidian can only be mined with a diamond one
From 0.7.0

MCPE-2680 – Cake takes away buckets along with milk
MCPE-2950 – Chat freezes
MCPE-2962 – Typing in chat gets blocked by [DONE] button and capitals
MCPE-3361 – Items in the crafting table are messed up
MCPE-3846 – If monsters burn because of sunlight, they have no burn animation.
MCPE-3988 – Furnace crash bug
MCPE-4056 – No Fire Animation on Zombies
MCPE-4403 – GUI circle size is too small
MCPE-4455 – Repeatedly being logged out of Realms
From 0.7.1

MCPE-2608 – No fire animation for night-time mobs when they come in contact with sunlight
MCPE-4281 – Chests cannot be placed next to other chests
MCPE-4332 – Armor glitch
From 0.7.2

MCPE-4557 – No text below the version
MCPE-4634 – Non-realms world creation glitch
References
http://web.archive.org/web/20130821065119/https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpe
"We moved to iOS version 5.0 for the 0.7.3 release. We hope this won't cause problems (we have no data on the number of 4.3 devices)." – @jbernhardsson on Twitter, August 7, 2013
"BIG NEWS! We have found the SEED of Minecraft's title-screen background PANORAMA!" – u/Tomlacko on Reddit, July 18, 2020
